Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの？ 浮かない顔して。 宝物が手に入ったのにさ。
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter? You're looking kinda down even though we found the treasure chest.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>。当初の目的を 忘れてはいないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, have you forgotten what we originally set out to do?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……<Blue>幻の島<White>を探してたんだよネ…… ゴメン……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh... We were looking for the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>, weren't we... Sorry...
